method.name: Mount
method.tp:docstring: 'Mounts' a given share by attempting to call smbc_opendir on given share path. 'Mounts' is in quotes because this does not actually do an actual mount since it is not needed on an SMB share. On success, this returns the corresponding mount id.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized MountOptions protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

arg.name: mount_id
arg.tp:docstring: Unique identifier of the mounted share.

method.name: Unmount
method.tp:docstring: Unmounts' the mount corresponding to the mount id. 'Unmounts' is in quotes because this does not do an actual unmount since SMB does not need to actually mount a share.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized UnmountOptions protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

method.name: ReadDirectory
method.tp:docstring: Reads the directory on a given path. This outputs a serialized DirectoryEntryList protobuf.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized ReadDirectoryOptions protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

arg.name: entries
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized DirectoryEntryList protobuf.

method.name: GetMetadataEntry
method.tp:docstring: Gets the metadata of a given entry. This outputs an serialized DirectoryEntry protobuf.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized GetMetadataEntryOptions protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

arg.name: entry
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized DirectoryEntry protobuf.

method.name: OpenFile
method.tp:docstring: Opens a file with a specified path.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized OpenFileOptions protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

arg.name: file_id
arg.tp:docstring: Unique identifier of the open file.

method.name: CloseFile
method.tp:docstring: Closes the file with the specified file handler.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized CloseFileOptions protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

method.name: DeleteEntry
method.tp:docstring: Deletes the entry with a specified path.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized DeleteEntryOptions protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

method.name: ReadFile
method.tp:docstring: Reads the file in a given samba file descriptor and writes the data in a temporary file. This outputs the file descriptor to the temporary file.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized ReadFileOptions protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

arg.name: temp_fd
arg.tp:docstring: File descriptor of the temporary file that contains the read data.

method.name: CreateFile
method.tp:docstring: Creates a file on the specified path.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized CreateFileOptions protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

method.name: Truncate
method.tp:docstring: Truncates a file on the specified path to a desired length.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized TruncateOptions protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

method.name: WriteFile
method.tp:docstring: Reads data from a temporary file and writes the data into the samba file with the specified handler.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized WriteFileOptionsProto protobuf.

arg.name: temp_fd
arg.tp:docstring: File descriptor of the temporary file that contains the data to be written.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

method.name: CreateDirectory
method.tp:docstring: Creates a directory at the specified path.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized CreateDirectoryOptionsProto protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

method.name: MoveEntry
method.tp:docstring: Moves an entry at the specified source path to the specified destination path.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized MoveEntryOptionsProto protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

method.name: CopyEntry
method.tp:docstring: Copies an entry at the specified source path to the specified destination path.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized CopyEntryOptionsProto protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

method.name: GetDeleteList
method.tp:docstring: Gets a list of entries to delete. The list of entries will be in order in which they should be deleted.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized GetDeleteListOptions protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

arg.name: temp_fd
arg.tp:docstring: File descriptor of the temporary file that contains a serialized DeleteList protobuf.

arg.name: bytes_written
arg.tp:docstring: Number of bytes written to the temporary file.

method.name: GetShares
method.tp:docstring: Gets a list of SMB shares from a host.

arg.name: options_blob
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized GetSharesOptionsProto protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

arg.name: shares
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized DirectoryEntryList protobuf.
